Articles.Content:
CrabCow is on his fifth attempt at making a glider landing on Duna. While he pulled it off, it was a very close call that had him sweating bullets. Have a look at how he made it. The original embed decided not to like us today so go HERE to watch the video.

Edited September 19, 2014 by Rowsdower

Half the time twitch tells me I'm banned, though I've never posted a single word there nor have I ever had an acct. The other half I'm in. Frustrating.

You have been blocked from using Twitch. Please visit the Support Center for more information on why you may have been banned.
Weird issues all around. The embed seemed to fail us today. Apologies on that, though I don't know what would cause you to be blocked from Twitch.

I made a forum account just to post but holy crap, that's me! I saw my view count skyrocket and now I know why.

I put my name in Google and stumbled on this thread, I don't browse the forums enough.

In hindsight, my overlay is big and a FAR+Deadly Re-entry combo made it a lot harder than it would be normally and I honestly don't know how the landing gear even stayed intact but I just feel really amazed you guys posted that highlight. Thank you so much, SQUAD.
